name: Flappy Gun
description:
Click to shoot.

Shoot to move.

Lose if you fall down below screen or go down to 0 HP.

Shooting an enemy will give you 2 HP & Score.

Shooting an ally ( green face ) will make you lose 2 score.

Pickup things in the map like hearth for health, wings to go through walls, hourglass to slow down time & the bullet to auto destroy nearby enemies for a few seconds.

This game was made because a subscriber on youtube challenged me to. :)
